messages.content: What vegan options do you have besides the tofu bowl?
Our only vegan option is the Quantum Tofu Bowl as listed in the menu.
Does the Dragon's Breath Omelette contain nuts?
It contains black truffle flakes which are fungus, but nuts are only optional in other dishes.
What's in the Mystic Mushroom Pasta?
Cordyceps-infused linguine with truffle oil and shaved parmesan.
Until what time is breakfast served?
Breakfast is served until 11:30 AM daily.
Can I order the Forgotten Flan without asking the server?
No, the secret item requires asking your server as per menu instructions.
Is the burger bun gluten-free?
The Black Hole Burger uses squid ink brioche which contains gluten.
Do you have completely nut-free dishes?
Most dishes are nut-free except where nuts are optional additions.
What makes the Salty Nebula Hash 'salty'?
The combination of chorizo and pickled jalapeños creates a savory salt-forward profile.
Is the sushi special available on weekends?
Silent Sushi Roll is only available Tuesday and Thursday.
How much does the secret flan cost?
The Forgotten Flan is priced at $8.99.
Do you have vegetarian burger options?
Our Black Hole Burger uses wagyu beef - we don't have vegetarian burger alternatives.
Which breakfast dish is spicy?
The Dragon's Breath Omelette contains ghost pepper, making it quite spicy.
What's the price of the mushroom pasta?
Mystic Mushroom Pasta costs $17.50.
What's written under the cafe name in the menu?
The motto is: 'Where obscure flavors shine!'
Are pancakes available after breakfast hours?
Foggy Morning Pancakes are only served until 11:30 AM with breakfast.
